attributes.action: help dementia sufferers by requesting the bbc to show the day and date on the screen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The quality of life of dementia sufferers  is severely diminished by not knowing what the day and date is.There is no way of checking this if you cannot remember yesterday.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
